Text:
Cracker_Jak, I think you're going to find that soon it's going to start calling home every few seconds if you've blocked it's internet connection and you will end up removing it. 

I used pirate copies of ver 11 for years not realizing how cheap it is now. This version is only $49 so I bought it. I've tried many other backup programs (not Novastore though). This is the best of any of those.
